Function.Description: The system function sends a string command to the host operating system.

Brief.Overview: The system function sends a string command to the host operating system. The string command must be a valid command phrase in the language of the host operating system. The contents of the command string are host operating system dependent.
Brief.Usage: The system function allows access to the command language of the host operating system.

Argument.Name: command
Argument.Note: A valid command phrase in the host operating system command language.

Syntax.Return: Zero if there was no error, or an error code.
